wikipedia_page.main: Harry Vaughan Watkins (10 September 1875 – 16 May 1945) was a Welsh rugby union player who played club rugby for Llanelli and London Welsh and gained six caps for the Wales national team. Watkins also played cricket and hockey for Carmarthenshire.
